Literature.Author: Bello-Madruga R, Torrent Burgas M. 2024
Literature.Reference: Comput Struct Biotechnol J. 2024 Feb 12;23:972-981. doi: 10.1016/j.csbj.2024.02.008.PubMed
Literature.Title: The limits of prediction: Why intrinsically disordered regions challenge our understanding of antimicrobial peptides

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (50%) to[RLLR]5R: 48%, L=S: 10%.Activity: active against E. coli BW25113 (MIC 25 uM), P. aeruginosa ATCC 15692 (MIC 25 uM), S. aureus ATCC 12600 (MIC 50 uM), and M. luteus ATCC 15307 (MIC 50 uM).Structure:  random coil in water but helical in SDS.
